flavorText: She sees mortals not as they wish to be, but as what they will become.

foreignData.flavorText: Sie sieht in Sterblichen nicht das, was sie sein möchten, sondern das, was sie werden.
foreignData.name: Sinnbild der Endgültigkeit
foreignData.text:
Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, haben Todesberührung.
Kreaturen, die deine Gegner kontrollieren, verlieren Todesberührung und können Todesberührung weder haben noch erhalten.

foreignData.flavorText: Ve a los mortales no como a ellos les gustaría ser, sino como serán realmente.
foreignData.name: Prototipo de irreversibilidad
foreignData.text:
Las criaturas que controlas tienen la habilidad de toque mortal.
Las criaturas que controlan tus oponentes pierden la habilidad de toque mortal y no pueden tener ni ganar esa habilidad.

foreignData.flavorText: Elle voit les mortels non pas tels qu'ils voudraient être, mais tels qu'ils deviendront.
foreignData.name: Archétype de la fatalité
foreignData.text:
Les créatures que vous contrôlez ont le contact mortel.
Les créatures que vos adversaires contrôlent perdent le contact mortel et ne peuvent pas avoir ou acquérir le contact mortel.

foreignData.flavorText: Dei mortali vede non ciò che desiderano essere, ma ciò che diventeranno.
foreignData.name: Archetipo dell'Ineluttabilità
foreignData.text:
Le creature che controlli hanno tocco letale.
Le creature controllate dai tuoi avversari perdono tocco letale e non possono avere tocco letale.

foreignData.flavorText: 彼女は定命の者を、その者が願う姿ではなく、いずれなる姿で見ている。
foreignData.name: 決断の元型
foreignData.text:
あなたがコントロールするクリーチャーは接死を持つ。
あなたの対戦相手がコントロールするクリーチャーは接死を失うとともに、接死を得ることも持つこともできない。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー・エンチャント — ゴルゴン

foreignData.flavorText: 그녀는 필멸자의 희망이 아닌 그들의 운명을 본다.
foreignData.name: 종결의 표상
foreignData.text:
당신이 조종하는 생물들은 치명타 능력을 가진다.
당신의 상대들이 조종하는 생물들은 치명타 능력을 잃고 치명타 능력을 가지거나 얻을 수 없다.

foreignData.flavorText: Ela vê os mortais não como eles gostariam de ser, mas como aquilo que se tornarão.
foreignData.name: Arquétipo da Finalidade
foreignData.text:
As criaturas que você controla têm toque mortífero.
As criaturas que seus oponentes controlam perdem toque mortífero e não podem ter nem ganhar toque mortífero.

foreignData.flavorText: Она видит смертных не такими, какими они хотят быть, а такими, какими они станут.
foreignData.name: Образец Завершенности
foreignData.text:
Существа под вашим контролем имеют Смертельное касание.
Существа под контролем ваших оппонентов теряют Смертельное касание и не могут иметь или получить Смертельное касание.

foreignData.flavorText: 她视凡人的意愿为无物，恣意决定他们的未来。
foreignData.name: 绝命典范
foreignData.text:
由你操控的生物具有死触异能。
由对手操控的生物失去死触异能，且不能具有或获得死触异能。

foreignData.flavorText: 她視凡人的意願為無物，恣意決定他們的未來。
foreignData.name: 絕命典範
foreignData.text:
由你操控的生物具有死觸異能。
由對手操控的生物失去死觸異能，且不能具有或獲得死觸異能。

name: Archetype of Finality
originalText:
Creatures you control have deathtouch.
Creatures your opponents control lose deathtouch and can't have or gain deathtouch.

rulings.text: The Archetype’s second ability applies to each creature controlled by any of your opponents, no matter when it entered the battlefield.

While you control an Archetype, continuous effects generated by the resolution of spells and abilities that would give the specified ability to creatures your opponents control aren’t created. For example, if you control Archetype of Courage, a spell cast by an opponent that gives creatures they control first strike wouldn’t cause the creatures to have first strike, even if later in the turn Archetype of Courage left the battlefield. (If the spell has additional effects, such as raising the power of the creatures, those effects will apply as normal.)
Conversely, continuous effects generated by static abilities (such as an Aura that granted the appropriate ability) would resume applying if the Archetype left the battlefield.
If you and an opponent each control the same Archetype, no creature controlled by any player will have the appropriate ability.

text:
Creatures you control have deathtouch.
Creatures your opponents control lose deathtouch and can't have or gain deathtouch.
